pageProduct.name: OGX Heavenly Hydration Cherry Blossom Conditioner 385ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Heavenly Hydration Cherry Blossom Conditioner helps boost shine and body while evoking the graceful beauty of the exotic blossoms of Japan. A hydrating conditioner that adds volume and won't weigh hair down. SLS free.
.

OGX Heavenly Hydration Cherry Blossom Conditioner

Why You Want It... Revitalize strands with help from this lightweight hydrating blend with cherry blossom extract and green tea for moisture that won't weigh your hair down.

Lightly quench strands with the help of this alluring blend with cherry blossom extract and green tea. It helps to boost shine and body while evoking the graceful beauty of the exotic blossoms of Japan.



  • Lightweight but hydrating conditioner that won't weigh down hair

  • Conditioner for shiny hair

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Heavenly Hydration
• Cherry Blossom Conditioner
• Green Tea



Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcoholm, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-17, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Prunus Serrulata Flower Extract, Camelia Sinensis Leaf Extract, CI 17200.

Directions

After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
